__e: First thing we gotta do when we get back is deal with Jasper and my brother.
But I didn't want my family to be a lie, Not for jasper and not for me.
We'll get back to Jasper, find a way to reach your mother and the rest of the team.
Jasper hasn't been away from human blood as long as the rest of us.
And as it turns out, what you told me about the murder of Jasper De Clerq was not entirely true.
Jasper's judgment is not the best, as perhaps you can now see, since his cause is lost.
